name: L.O.L - Labor Of Love
description:
Controls are simply using the mouse to set traps and activate the traps press A

A game made for Mini Jam 112:Chrono

-----------------------------------------------

Knights from all over the kingdom gather to conquer the princess's heart,

but she is not interested in getting married...so you need to help her 

get rid of all the lovey Dovey annoying knights!!!

---------------------------------------

Code & Game Design Asaf Farber

Art, Animation & Game design by Amit Roz & Daniel Bluchu

Music & SFX by Shai Hammerfield

do you think you got what it takes to keep the princess marriage free?
